body: This black corset fits neatly beneath armor. As a free action, the wearer can compress herself to fit through tight spaces as though affected by a squeeze spell (Advanced Race Guide) for up to 10 rounds per day. While using the corset's magic, she gains a +5 bonus on Escape Artist checks.
name: Corset of the Vishkanya
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Body/Body Slot Wondrous Items/Corset of the Vishkanya
